vcblr.expSts: Some couples abandon to have second child due to the increasing financial burden. 一些夫妻迫于不断加重的经济压力，放弃生育二胎。

vcblr.translation: n. 能力,本领,才能,才干
vcblr.expSts: I'm sure he will do the work to the best of his ability. 我肯定他会尽最大努力做好这件事。
They thought his behaviour was abnormal. 他们认为他行为反常。

vcblr.translation: prep. 在（到）船（飞机、车）上,上船（飞机、车）
adv. 在（到）船（飞机、车）上,上船（飞机、车）
vcblr.expSts: Welcome aboard! 欢迎乘坐该船（飞机、车）！
These superstitious pratices should be abolished as soon as possible. 这些迷信的做法应该尽早废除。

vcblr.translation: n. 人工流产,堕胎,（计划等）的失败,夭折
vcblr.expSts: She had an abortion. 她做了人工流产。

vcblr.translation: adj. 突然的,意外的,（举止、言谈等）唐突的,鲁莽的
vcblr.expSts: There are abrupt weather changes. 天有不测风云。

vcblr.phrase: in the absence of 在（人）不在时,在（物）缺乏时
vcblr.expSts: He took a one-week leave of absence. 他请了一周的假。

vcblr.translation: adj. （from）缺席的,缺乏的,不存在的
vcblr.expSts: Love was totally absent from his childhood. 他在童年时丝毫没有得到关爱。
Power tends to corrupt, and absolute power corrupts absolutely. 权力导致腐败，绝对权力绝对导致腐败。

vcblr.translation: vt. 吸引,吸引…的注意,同化,理解,掌握
vcblr.expSts: You must absorb as much information as possible. 你必须掌握尽可能多的信息。

vcblr.translation: n. 摘要,抽象派艺术作品
vt. 写…的摘要,提取,抽取
vcblr.expSts: A flower is beautiful, but beauty itself is abstract. 花是美的，但美是抽象的。
